summary: A request form for operational and security approval concerning Santiago ALTATA Fernándes under Project JYATE, specifying the area of use as Cuba and indicating various record checks and evaluations.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is a request form, dated 2-775, submitted by Margaret Jose of the CI/CA, seeking provisional operational and covert security approval for Santiago ALTATA Fernándes under Project JYATE. The request specifies Cuba as the special area of use, indicates that Fernándes will be used as FW Trainee, includes inquiries about whether Fernándes would suspect U.S. government or CIA interest, and notes there are no special limitations requested for the security office investigation. The form also indicates that a Green List is attached and that no record derogatory information was found.
title: Request for Approval or Investigative Action: Santiago ALTATA Fernándes
